2d sidescroller where you play as randomly picked bros from the roster you unlock as you play bros have varying abilities that present different playstyles and are suited to different encounters each time you die and lose a life or rescue a bro and gain a life you are given a different random bro than you started the level with forcing the player to rethink their plan for the level

broforce is a sidescroller where are play as a collection of legally distinctly different characters from popular action movies each life you have is a different random character as you rescue characters each one adds to the pool of characters so every time you are hit that character dies and a new character is dropped in for you to play as this keeps the game constantly feeling fresh moment to moment as well as the fast and frenetic overall score great
